name: DENTAL_HB_EST_HX
description: Dental procedure estimates history as calculated from the Hospital Billing (HB) estimates application programming interface (API).

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENT_HX_CALC_PRICE
columns.description: The historical price of a dental procedure as calculated by the Hospital Billing application

columns.name: DENT_HX_ADJ_PRICE
columns.description: The historical user-adjusted price of the dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENT_HX_ADJ_REASN_C_NAME
columns.description: The historical reason for a price adjustment for a dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENT_HX_ADJ_COMMENT
columns.description: The historical comment for the price adjustment for a dental procedure (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENT_HX_ADJ_USER_ID
columns.description: Historical user that adjusted the estimate (Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENT_HX_ADJ_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: DENT_HX_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: Stores the historical patient portion of a dental procedure's price (used for Hospital Billing estimates only)

columns.name: DENT_HX_OUTDATED_YN
columns.description: Stores whether a historical estimate value is flagged as out of date (used for Hospital Billing estimates only)
